Package de.esoco.lib.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EchoInputStream
    An input stream that echos all bytes that are read from a wrapped input stream to an output stream.
    EchoOutputStream
    An output stream that echos all bytes that are written to a wrapped output stream to another output stream.
    EchoReader
    A Reader that echos all characters that are read from a wrapped reader to a Writer.
    EchoWriter
    A Writer that echos all characters that are written to a wrapped writer to another writer.
    IOFunctions
    Contains factory methods for I/O-related functions.
    IOFunctions.PatternFilenameFilter
    Implementation of FilenameFilter that uses a regular expression pattern for the filename selection.
    LimitedInputStream
    An input stream wrapper that limits the number of bytes that can be read from the stream.
    LimitedOutputStream
    An output stream wrapper that limits the number of bytes that can be written to the stream.
    LimitedReader
    A wrapper for Reader instances that limits the number of characters that can be read from it.
    LimitedWriter
    A wrapper for Writer instances that limits the number of characters that can be written to it.
    RandomAccessFileInputStream
    A wrapper that forwards the input stream read methods to the corresponding RandomAccessFile methods so that stream-based tools can be used on the file.
    RandomAccessFileOutputStream
    A wrapper that forwards the output stream write methods to the corresponding RandomAccessFile methods so that stream-based tools and classes can be used on the file.
    StreamFunctions
    Provides access to stream and I/O related function implementations.
    StreamUtil
    Class containing tools for access to IO streams.
    StreamUtil.ReadHandler
    Used by StreamUtil methods to process values that have been read from a stream.
    XmlWriter
    A simple class to write XML files directly to an arbitrary Writer instance.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    StreamLimitException
    An IO exception that is thrown if a stream has reached a limit.
